name: Jultrubbel
description:
A quick silly Christmas game for Gamedev GBG's Advent Calendar.

Game made by Morgis

"All I want " music and sound effects are made by Malin Abrahamsson.

Title image from Unsplashed.

Graphics are from the RTP package and Christmas tiles from SchwartzeNacht.

And shamelessly borrowed without permission from Digimon Adventure 02:

Jingle bells - by Takaishi Takeru and Hida Iori.

Silent night - by Hikari Yagami and  Miyako Inoue.
